name: DPS5020
Info:
DPS powersupply needs to be connected with your computer.
  You can set a parameters in file DPS5020.py:
    - default_device = '/dev/ttyUSB0'
    - SERIAL_BAUDRATE = 9600
    - SERIAL_BYTESIZE = 8
    - SERIAL_TIMEOUT = 2
  You will need to run RTOC as root to connect to USB-Devices unless you set devices rules. See [this tutorial](http://ask.xmodulo.com/change-usb-device-permission-linux.html) for how to set device rules.
